OES_standard_derivatives.summary: The OES_standard_derivatives extension is part of the WebGL API and adds the GLSL derivative functions dFdx, dFdy, and fwidth.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is only available to {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} contexts. In {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}}, the functionality of this extension is available on the WebGL2 context by default. In WebGL 2, the constant is available as gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER_DERIVATIVE_HINT and it requires GLSL #version 300 es.
